title: [Large-scale] Language Problem-Solving Projects in Web-Based Constructivist Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic web tools and beginner-level language learning
context.additional_context: Most learners are students or job seekers aiming to improve language problem-solving skills. Provided with digital devices (tablets/laptops) and real-time collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

learning_goals: Using web-based tools, learners will complete language-related problem-solving projects with at least 80% accuracy.
Through collaborative learning, learners will propose three or more strategies for creatively solving language-related problems.
Learners demonstrate an adaptation level to the learning environment with a satisfaction rate of 4.0/5.0 or higher in online surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
